input.sentences: i was loved the basketball tournament !
each of us had a temporary tattoo painted on our hands !
those cartoons the artist drew of us were hilarious .

output.sentences: I loved the basketball tournament this past wekend.
This girl got a temporary tattoo painted on her hand.
There was an artist who drew hilarious caricatures of people.
The basketball players had to sign their name on their team poster.
People bought souvenir shirts at the tournament.
